meanings.definition: The act of affixing or attaching something to something else.
meanings.sent1: She carefully placed the affixtures on the wall to hang the painting.
meanings.sent2: The affixtures on the document made it official.
meanings.sent3: The affixtures decided to have a race to see who could stick the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like affixtures, connecting people together.
meanings.sent5: The bright red affixtures stood out against the white background.

meanings.definition: Things that are affixed or attached to something else.
meanings.sent1: The affixtures on the shelf held up the books.
meanings.sent2: He collected various affixtures to decorate his room.
meanings.sent3: The affixtures on the tree seemed to be having a conversation.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky looked like affixtures holding up the night.
meanings.sent5: The tiny affixtures added a touch of elegance to the room.
